::GoldenEye::

She shook from the skock of of the crash.  She saw Dollen's body 
layng there.  She jumped out of the front window of the pod and ran 
to him.  She knealed down next to him and craddled his head.  She 
looked to see how badly he was hurt. "Can you hear me? Please, wake 
up."  She tried to pick him up, but he was too heavy to lift.  She 
looked around hoping someone had seen the crash and come to them.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dollen::
> 
>         The pod kept flying, and Dollen looked at some scenery 
while flying.
> Soon, he spotted the base below.  He slowly flew downwards, 
carefully.
> Suddenly, an image of the beautiful bot struck his mind.  He 
jumped, and he
> accidentally pushed the steering handle to the left.  The pod went 
racing
> diagonally going straight towards the ground.  He knew they were 
going to
> crash.  He got out of his seat, and jumped in front of GoldenEye to 
prevent
> her from flying out.  The pod hit the ground, and went skidding.  
It hit a
> tree, and Dollen went flying right through the windshield and hit 
the tree.
> He lay on the front of the smashed up pod, lifelessly.  They were 
just
> outside the base, luckily they hadn't crashed into it.  But Dollen 
wasn't so
> lucky.
